elements.name: Add a new pet into the store SUCCESSFULLY

steps.name: I set base URL for the request to the petstore
I set endpoint to "/pet"
I set header "accept" to value "application/json"
I set header "Content-Type" to value "application/json"
I set body with this information:
I set operation request to "POST"
I execute the request
the status code should be a 200
the response json path "id" should be a valid id
the response json path "name" should be "Pitufo"
the pet should be available in the store

name: Add a new pet
description:
In order to sell a pet
  As a store owner
  I want to add a new pet to the catalog

elements.name: Search for a pet by id SUCCESSFULLY

steps.name: I set base URL for search request to the petstore
I set endpoint for  searching "/pet/1845563262948980307"
I set header for  request "accept" to value "application/json"
And  I set operation for searching request to "GET"
I search for the pet id
the status code of search request should be a 200
I should get the pet with the id "1845563262948980307"

elements.name: Search for a pet by id UNSUCCESSFULLY, a pet id that doesn't exits in data base, throw a 404 error (not found)

steps.name: I set base URL for search request to the petstore
I set endpoint for  searching "/pet/-7"
I set header for  request "accept" to value "application/json"
And  I set operation for searching request to "GET"
I search for the pet id
the status code of search request should be a 404

And  I set operation for searching request to "GET"

the status code of search request should be a 404

elements.name: Search for many pets by different status SUCCESSFULLY (available,pending, sold)

steps.name: I set base URL for search request to the petstore
I set endpoint for  searching "/pet/findByStatus?status=available"
I set header for  request "accept" to value "application/json"
And  I set operation for searching request to "GET"
I search for pets with the corresponding status "available"
the status code of search request should be a 200
